level.text: The Agency shall do the following:
Provide an on-line computer terminal to the agent at no cost;
Install initial telephone lines required for the operation of the on-line computer terminal at no expense to the agent;
Pay all monthly fees charged by the telephone company for the use of communication lines to the on-line computer;
Pay the agent a commission as determined by the Board; and
Reimburse the agent for prizes paid by the agent in excess of monies collected from the sale of lottery tickets.
The Executive Director may adopt Instant Game Ticket Administration Procedures governing, among other things, the purchase, return and payment of instant game tickets by agents.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 36 DCR 8665, 8679 (December 29, 1989); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 39 DCR 2286, 2288 (April 3, 1992).
